1627,simple,,"Development of Transdermal Drug Delivery for Anti-Hypertensive Drug Paperback – July 30, 2015",1,0,visible,,"The book focuses on the designing and development of transdermal drug delivery system for delivery of antihypertensive drugs. The transdermal route is a novel drug delivery aspect which mainly contributes towards patient compliance and sustained drug plasma level. Administration of drugs via dermal route can bypass various disadvantages caused when administered orally and may maintain relatively consistent plasma levels for long-term therapy. The book will prove to fruitful for researchers in the field of drug delivery.
